XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for common Data Hub version 2 import plugin

TABLE.NAME: dhimport_version2_mapping
TABLE.COMMENT: Field mapping configuration for version 2 import plugin

FIELD.NAME: entitytype
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of entity being operated on, e.g. course

FIELD.NAME: standardfieldname
FIELD.COMMENT: The standard name of the field being mapped out

FIELD.NAME: customfieldname
FIELD.COMMENT: The custom name of the field being mapped out
